OmniSupervisorConfigAction.name: OmniSupervisorConfigAction
OmniSupervisorConfigAction.description: Represents the actions available to the supervisors of an Omni-Channel supervisor configuration.

DisplayOrder.description: The order in which the action is displayed.

OmniSupervisorActionType.description: An action that a supervisor can perform.

OmniSupervisorConfigId.description: A unique identifier for the Omni-Channel supervisor configuration.

OmniSupervisorConfigAction.accessRules: To access this object, Omni-Channel must be enabled.
